Title: Relates to criminal possession of semiautomatic rifles, shotguns and pistols by persons under the age of twenty-one
Summary: Prohibits the criminal possession of semiautomatic rifles, shotguns and pistols by persons under the age of twenty-one unless such person was eighteen prior to January 1, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to criminal possession of semiautomatic rifles, shotguns and pistols by persons under the age of twenty-one
